amendment.description: An amendment numbered 36 printed in Part B of House Report 117-12 to replace the bill's text with the text of the Violence Against Women Extension Act.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to replace the bill's text with the text of the Violence Against Women Extension Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stefanik amendment (A003) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 177 - 249 (Roll no. 85).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A003) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Stefanik.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Stefanik amendment (A003) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 177 - 249 (Roll no. 85).
